gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 126, Hornets 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Hornets, 126-106. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 31 points, nine assists, five steals and three blocks for the Thunder, his ninth straight game with 30+ points, and league-leading 37th 30+ point game of the season, while Chet Holmgren added 16 points and six rebounds in the victory. Brandon Miller tallied 28 points (5-8 3pt. FG), four rebounds and four assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Thunder improve to 34-15 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 10-37.
